#Text=Bolin says : " So how did a bunch of water and firebenders end up in one of Kuvira 's reeducation camps ? "
#Text=Ahnah says : " Call it what it is : a prison . "
#Text=Baraz says : " Kuvira 's been purging states of anyone who 's not of Earth Kingdom origin and locking them up . "
#Text=Bolin says : " Purging ?! "
#Text=Baraz says : " What are you acting so surprised for ?

#Text=You must have known what she was up to , being part of her  inner circle " and all .

column1: #Text=" Bolin says : " No , I swear !
#Text=And the inner circle thing lasted like , less than a day !
#Text=" Varrick says : " Will you at least tell us where you 're taking us ?
#Text=" Baraz says : " The border checkpoint .
#Text=You 're gon na help us talk our way past some Earth Empire soldiers .
#Text=" Ahnah says : " And once we 're through , we 'll see about letting you go .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Lava time !
#Text=Bet you did n't expect that !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Look , I 'm sorry for what happened to all of you , but as I 've been trying to explain , we do n't work for Kuvira anymore .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Yeah .
#Text=If our handsome mugs get recognized trying to go through that checkpoint , we 're goners !
#Text=" Baraz says : " If you really are fugitives , you better listen up .
#Text=We 've been scouting this region for days .
#Text=There 's a wall stretching along the entire border and patrols guarding every part of it .
#Text=That checkpoint is the only way out .
#Text=" Ahnah says : " It 's not worth the risk , Baraz .
#Text=How do we know they wo n't turn us in ?
#Text=" Baraz says : " If he wanted us gone , we 'd be at the bottom of a pool of lava right now .
#Text=If any of us want to get out of the Earth Empire alive , we 'll have to trust each other .
#Text=" Bolin says : " All right , where is this checkpoint ?
#Text="
